--- title: "Nick's Family Tree" subtitle: "Using googlesheets data and R packages to visualize a family tree" image: "images/noun-hi-1994887.svg" date: "05/29/2023" date-format: "MMMM D, YYYY" page-layout: article toc: true draft: True comments: utterances: repo: ngiangre/quarto-site --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} install.packages("googlesheets4") ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(googledrive) library(googlesheets4) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Attaching package: 'googlesheets4' ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following objects are masked from 'package:googledrive': request_generate, request_make ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} googledrive::drive_auth(email = "nick.giangreco@gmail.com") googlesheets4::gs4_auth(token = drive_token()) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} (nick_family_tree <- read_sheet( drive_get('nick_family_tree') )) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` ✔ The input `path` resolved to exactly 1 file. ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` ✔ Reading from "nick_family_tree". ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` ✔ Range 'Sheet1'. ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 14 × 4 Parent Child Relat…¹ Gener…² 1 John Lucchese (Grandpa) Phil Lucchese (Uncle Phil) NA NA 2 John Lucchese (Grandpa) Mary Jo Foley (Aunt Mary Jo) NA NA 3 John Lucchese (Grandpa) John Lucchese (Uncle John) NA NA 4 John Lucchese (Grandpa) Sharon Giangreco (Mom) NA NA 5 John Lucchese (Grandpa) Jacquelyn Szachara (Aunt Jacquely… NA NA 6 John Lucchese (Grandpa) Chris Lucchese (Uncle Chris) NA NA 7 Phil Lucchese (Uncle Phil) Lynn McGill (Aunt Lynn) NA NA 8 Phil Lucchese (Uncle Phil) Stephanie Lucchese (Cousin Stepha… NA NA 9 Phil Lucchese (Uncle Phil) Tim Lucchese (Cousin Tim) NA NA 10 Phil Lucchese (Uncle Phil) Dan Lucchese (Cousin Dan) NA NA 11 Sharon Giangreco (Mom) Paul Giangreco (Dad) NA NA 12 Paul Giangreco (Dad) Nicholas Giangreco NA NA 13 Paul Giangreco (Dad) Maria Giangreco (Sister) NA NA 14 Paul Giangreco (Dad) Marc Giangreco NA NA # … with abbreviated variable names ¹​Relationship, ²​Generation ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # install.packages('networkD3') networkD3::simpleNetwork(nick_family_tree,Source = 'Parent',Target = 'Child',charge = -50) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(dplyr) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Attaching package: 'dplyr' ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': filter, lag ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following objects are masked from 'package:base': intersect, setdiff, setequal, union ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} networkD3::diagonalNetwork( list(name = "John Lucchese (Grandpa)", children = nick_family_tree %>% filter(Parent=="John Lucchese (Grandpa)") %>% pull(Child) %>% lapply(function(x){ list(name = x) })) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: :::
